Before embarking on any future relationship, you need to make sincere
Tawbah. Once you have made Tawbah, you need to start your journey on self
reformation. This self reformation in the shape of your daily Salaats,
recitation of the Qur'aan and the like will open the doors for a better
future. Then, once this is achieved, you need to inform your parents before
they hear it from someone else would lead to more serious trouble.

By this time, your friend would have received the message that you do not
want anything to do with him and he cannot inform your parents because they
are already aware of the problem. As for marriage, with sincere Tawbah and
change in life style and continuous Du'aa, Allah Ta'ala will make it easy
for you to marry someone that will respect you and not hold it for you that
you have had somebody else. But this can only happen if you can see a change
in your life.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
